channel.title: D claw problem

item.title: D claw problem
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

i have a problem with my d claws the spec hits 4 numbers on players but on npcs it hits 4 numbers but one number is above 0 the others are 0

theres the image need help anybody can anybody help with this
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){

specialAtk(false, 50, 252, 2068);
/This Makes Them Go To 4 Which Starts The Damage In Process - Digistr/
AttackingOn2.DclawDamage = 4;
specOn = false;
/*This Makes The Other Players DclawDamg1 = Your MAX Hit … – Digistr

  • The Math.round Prevent It From Being A Decimal And Rounds Down.
    */
    AttackingOn2.DclawDamg1 = misc.random(Math.round(((playerMaxHit)*20)/15));
    }
    thats my player d claw thingy
    heres npc one
    if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
    specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068);
    DCdown = 4;
    DCDamg = true;
    npcDamage(8);
    }
    i dont know if this helps if it does can anybody help me. its a deltascape base.

Read full topic
